turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me with placing a Starbucks order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: of course. what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a vanilla latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a grande vanilla latte with soy milk, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to pick it up in Horsham.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On Hasham Road, it's in Pennsylvanian.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the Starbucks at horsham road.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. bye!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
